name: Match Town Makeover: Design
description:
Welcome to West Haven Bay! This paradise beach town used to be the stuff of dreams, but now it needs your help to be restored to its former glory. Match and blast through the levels to advance in a storyline full of unexpected twists and turns, enjoy the company of lovable characters and rebuild your dream town!

Use your design skills to decorate homes, renovate tourist attractions and help residents makeover their shops and restaurants. Bring life back into this holiday dream destination, solve its hidden mystery, unlock new areas of the town and continue building!

While this game is absolutely free to play, you have the ability to unlock optional bonuses via in-app purchases from within the game. You may disable in-app purchases in your device settings.

● PLAY through a unique, never-before-seen combination of match-3 and town renovation in one game!
● LIVE out your designer dreams in an intriguing and cinematic storyline that blends history, mystery and customization
● EXPLORE hundreds of exciting and colorful design options for your beach town
● MASTER hundreds of unique match-3 levels
● WIELD incredible boosters and power-up combos
● BEFRIEND dozens of charming characters
● FOLLOW your friends’ progress with the innovative built-in social network
● UNLOCK a variety of areas in the town and renovate, design and develop
● iPhone XR support
● iPad Pro Display support
____________________________

Game available in: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Japanese
